hotels.title: Romantic Boutique Sri Lanka Villas with Breathtaking Views over Knuckles Mountain Range
hotels.description: Experience the tranquil beauty of Sri Lanka with a stay at this award-winning resort perched atop the island's central highlands. Escape to this oasis of opulence, where luxury intertwines seamlessly with nature's embrace. Discover the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Kandy, home to the Temple of the Tooth and the Royal Botanical Gardens, before returning to the resort to enjoy a refreshing dip in the infinity pool. Surrender to the tranquility of lush surroundings as you revel in the unmatched comfort of private villas, each featuring either a Jacuzzi or plunge pool. Savour authentic Sri Lankan cuisine at the onsite restaurant, and enjoy the resort's yoga and meditation facilities for a truly rejuvenating experience.
